pages.text: The $(item)Smart Chest Upgrade Kit/$ is a convenience which lets you upgrade any wooden chest or $(l:machines/reinforced_chest)Reinforced Chest/$ to a $(l:machines/smart_chest)Smart Chest/$ in-place, keeping the chest's items. Just $(thing)Sneak-Right-click/$ the upgrade kit against any valid chest to upgrade it.
$(p)Note: If used on a $(item)Reinforced Chest/$, you will get back a Reinforced Chest as an item drop. If used on a $(item)wooden chest/$, you will get that chest back as an item drop.
Creating a Smart Chest Upgrade Kit.$(p)Note that the Smart Chest must be completely empty and unconfigured.
